definitions.definition: An edge that is canted , one that is not a 90-degree angle; a chamfer .
examples: to give a bevel to the edge of a table or a stone slab

definitions.definition: An instrument consisting of two rules or arms , jointed together at one end, and opening to any angle, for adjusting the surfaces of work to the same or a given inclination; a bevel square .
A die used for cheating , having some sides slightly rounded instead of flat.

main_definition: An edge that is canted , one that is not a 90-degree angle; a chamfer .
secondary_definitions: An instrument consisting of two rules or arms , jointed together at one end, and opening to any angle, for adjusting the surfaces of work to the same or a given inclination; a bevel square .
( gambling ) A die used for cheating , having some sides slightly rounded instead of flat.
